Step3.Summary: check steam control valve is closed (V1)

Step5.Summary: check steam header valve status = clear ( V1 )

Step6.Summary: check react press >  SP_steam_repressurization_target_pressure ( SP1 )  & check react press <= SP_maximum_reactor_pressure ( SP2)  & sorbent temp < SP_maximum_sorbent_temperature ( SP3)

Step7.Summary: check purge valve status = clear ( V1 ) &  set purge duration =   SP_purge_duration ( SP1)

Step8.Summary: check react press <= SP_maximum_reactor_pressure( SP1) & sorbent temp < SP_maximum_sorbent_temperature ( SP2)
